section.title: 0.2 release
section.p: There following new features were added:-

ul.li: The getText() and getStringValue() methods of Element now return the textual values of CDATA, Entity and Text nodes. The previous version only returned Text node values.
Refactored code and removed XPathEngine, XPathHelper and all the static newXXX() methods in DocumentFactory. Added equivalent methods to DocumentHelper and DocumentFactory.

section.p: This release also includes full XPath source code.
